overview: They put on their make-up and clothes while chatting and gossiping. On the way to the club they argue a lot and almost clash with a bunch of boys. Youssef Youssef composes a finetuned character study about gender that echoes elements of Cassavetes and even film noir. Detalhes
tagline: The queens Amber la Garce and Moon are getting ready for another big night out.
title: Queens
